## BaseModelController.router property

Express-Router to add custom handlers to the standard available routes. Handlers have to be registered before [BaseModelController.activateStandardRouting](./clm-core.basemodelcontroller.activatestandardrouting.md) has been called.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
router: express.Router;
```
